actions.args: {"body": {"name": "Funding for Race of Sloths [September-October 2024]", "summary": "Race of Sloth successfully continues its journey.\\\\nDuring Sep-Oct we collected additional feedback, upgraded our GitHub bot and Leaderboard, continued marketing activities (X,  Telegram, Reddit), launched Rosctober event with 21 active participants who did 150+ Pull Requests (+30% growth M2M). Since the start of the Race of Sloths 11 developers became the part of the Sloths Hall of Fame.", "category": "Tooling & Infrastructure", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "frol.near", "description": "Race of Sloths is a friendly competition where you can participate in challenges and compete with other open-source contributors within your normal workflow\\\\n\\\\nFor contributors:\\\\n\\\\u{2022} Tag the bot inside your pull requests\\\\n\\\\u{2022} Wait for the maintainer to review and score your pull request\\\\n\\\\u{2022} Check out position in the leaderboard on the landing page\\\\n\\\\u{2022} Keep weekly and monthly streaks to reach higher positions\\\\n\\\\u{2022} Boast your contributions with a dynamic picture of your Profile\\\\n\\\\nFor maintainers:\\\\n\\\\u{2022} Score pull requests that participate in the Race of Sloths\\\\n\\\\u{2022} Engage contributors with fair scoring and fast responses so they keep their streaks\\\\n\\\\u{2022} Promote the Race to the point where the Race starts promoting you\\\\n\\\\u{2022} Grow the community of your contributors\\\\n\\\\nWe use NEAR for the backend implementation and will use on-chain rewards going forward, and as such onboard real open source developers to NEAR.\\\\n\\\\nlink to GitHub project: https://github.com/orgs/NEAR-DevHub/projects/6\\\\nlink to GitHub repository: https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/race-of-sloths\\\\nlink to Website: https://race-of-sloths.com/\\\\nlink to X: https://x.com/race_of_sloths\\\\nlink to Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/RaceOfSloth\\\\n\\\\nPlan for November-December:\\\\n\\\\n\\\\u{2022} Add mechanics to incentivize maintainers\\\\n\\\\u{2022} Upgrade website with Hall of Fame page\\\\n\\\\u{2022} Launch referral program \\\\n\\\\u{2022} Launch Christmas Event \\\\n\\\\nTeam composition:\\\\n\\\\u{2022} Alex Botezatu - ops lead - ex. NDC, Aurora, Bitfury\\\\n\\\\u{2022} Gleb Palienko - product/project manager - ex. Calimero, Boosty labs, Bitfury\\\\n\\\\u{2022} Artur-Yurii Korchynskyi - tech lead - ex. NDC, GGXchain\\\\n\\\\u{2022} Paula Vuli\\\\u{107} - marketing lead - ex. Calimero\\\\n\\\\u{2022} Andrii Saichuk - frontend developer - ex. NDC\\\\n\\\\nBudget for 2 months: $32.150 (including the Prize Pool for Rosctober $10.000)\\\\n", "linked_proposals": [194], "receiver_account": "24a2788251373b64d58200665f12b00cfb2d6c9d2dc79b209d39cd0e433f5b3f", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "32150", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDT"}, "labels": [], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 131549716}

{"data": {"devhub.near": {"post": {"main": "{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"text\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"We have just received a new *Tooling & Infrastructure* proposal.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**By**: @24a2788251373b64d58200665f12b00cfb2d6c9d2dc79b209d39cd0e433f5b3f\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Title**: \\\\u{201c}Funding for Race of Sloths [September-October 2024]\\\\u{201c}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Summary**:\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nRace of Sloth successfully continues its journey.\\\\\\\\nDuring Sep-Oct we collected additional feedback, upgraded our GitHub bot and Leaderboard, continued marketing activities (X,  Telegram, Reddit), launched Rosctober event with 21 active participants who did 150+ Pull Requests (+30% growth M2M). Since the start of the Race of Sloths 11 developers became the part of the Sloths Hall of Fame.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nRead the full proposal and share your feedback on [DevHub](/devhub.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=237)\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}}}

{"data": {"devhub.near": {"post": {"main": "{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"text\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"We have just received a new *Tooling & Infrastructure* proposal.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**By**: @24a2788251373b64d58200665f12b00cfb2d6c9d2dc79b209d39cd0e433f5b3f\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Title**: \\\\u{201c}Funding for Race of Sloths [September-October 2024]\\\\u{201c}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Summary**:\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nRace of Sloth successfully continues its journey.\\\\\\\\nDuring Sep-Oct we collected additional feedback, upgraded our GitHub bot and Leaderboard, continued marketing activities (X,  Telegram, Reddit), launched Rosctober event with 21 active participants who did 150+ Pull Requests (+30% growth M2M). Since the start of the Race of Sloths 11 developers became the part of the Sloths Hall of Fame.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nRead the full proposal and share your feedback on [DevHub](/devhub.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=238)\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}}}
